item.title: T1 Rex Is On The Kindle
item.description: Have you experienced the joy of reading with electronic ink? More than half a million dedicated readers have transitioned from traditional books to the lightweight Amazon Kindle. Many more are eagerly anticipating the release of the larger Kindle DX later this year. Kindle represents the future of reading, and we’re excited to be part of their blog collection. Rest assured, you can still access our content on your computer whenever you like, as that’s where it’s created and stored.

item.title: Can The Big Amazon Kindle DX Save The Newspapers?
item.description: The recent debut of the larger Amazon Kindle DX has been hailed by some as a potential savior for the struggling newspaper industry. However, this nearly $500 device, while innovative, is unlikely to reverse the decline of print newspapers. It’s simply too late and too expensive a solution for an industry facing dire financial straits. Had newspapers embraced electronic delivery methods a decade ago, the outcome might have been different. Now, many are on the brink of collapse, and technology alone cannot salvage them.
